page.title: 13Houses in Ribchester
page.content: My house is terraced. It has six windows, they all open. Our house is made out of brick. Our front door is just wood. We have got a garden and a shed, our house has nine rooms. We used to have leaded lights. We have two chimney pots. We have got a cellar and a loft. Richard, age 8 My house has a glass door. It has got a built in window, it has a slate roof. It is built of brick with rendering over. At the back there is a built in bedroom. It has a drive at the side and it has a door at the back.Michael,age7. My house is a cottage. I've got ten windows and I've got a tiled roof. I've got two doors. I've got three bedrooms and one bathroom and I have a blue front door.Sioned, age 6..
